title: RNC Seeks to Choke Debate Commission Fundraising in Escalation of Dispute
sub_head: Past sponsors have included large corporations, foundations and associations
body:
The Republican National Committee is trying to choke off fundraising for the commission that’s been the organizer of general election presidential debates for more than three decades, escalating a dispute that’s been brewing for years.
In a letter to the Commission on Presidential Debates first shared with The Wall Street Journal, the RNC recommends that the independent nonprofit organization shouldn’t fundraise off the notion that its work might include GOP candidates in the 2024 election.
